dimension: H.7-1/8 x W.8-11/16 in. (overall, with handles)
title: Two-handled vessel
description: Two-tone brown vessel dark brown body, lighter brown band on neck; dark green lip; one handle on each side of body just below widest part; two vertical bands of decoration, each 2-1/2 in. long, on each side between handles; glaze drips form four feet, all concentrated on half of vessel
creditline: Gift of Rev. Richard L. Hillstrom
